attributes.action: Allow the option to block BBC programmes from your devices
attributes.background: In order for a TV to be enforceable you must be watching bbc programmes. I propose to allow an option to block all BBC programmes negating the need to pay the licence fee.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the case that you only have to pay for a TV licence if you watch BBC programmes. We are therefore unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242191
